channel.title: Bargraph on Yedzin's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bargraph on Yedzin's Data Science Blog

item.title: Bar Graph
item.description: library(devtools) library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) #visualizing the data ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity')+ coord_flip()+ xlab("Team name")+ ylab("Homeruns")+ ggtitle("Total Homerun Distribution")
